Articles.Content:
Hi there. After a little break, I started a new career game, even though, like this, I will never see the end of the tech tree...

Here are some impressions logged:

http://falkenherz.blogspot.de/
Some nice designs you've got there. And I like the citation at the top of your page, very fitting

Thanks! I just love the way how the game makes you learn by leading you to your own conclusions by just doing it.

Without the limitations of career mode, I would have never been challenged to do stuff like SSTOs (ok, minus some boosters...) with a "Swivel" engine and wings. And it works perfectly well, at that.
